meta.title: Raha IO - Infrastructure, DevOps, Cloud
meta.description: We provide infrastructure and DevOps solutions based on AWS, Hetzner, and Arvancloud to reduce your team's operational overhead.

hero.title: Infrastructure that runs itself.
hero.subtitle: Raha IO helps teams reduce costs around maintaining and controlling infrastructure with DevOps solutions built on AWS, Hetzner, and Arvancloud.

pillars.title: AWS
pillars.desc: Enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure and managed services.

pillars.title: Hetzner
pillars.desc: Cost-effective dedicated servers and cloud solutions.

pillars.title: Arvancloud
pillars.desc: Regional CDN, cloud, and edge services for MENA.

about.title: Infrastructure experts, cost optimizers
about.body: We are a team of DevOps engineers and cloud architects. We help teams build reliable infrastructure while reducing the overhead of maintenance and operations.
highlights: Infrastructure as Code with Terraform and Ansible

services.title: What we do
services.subtitle: End-to-end infrastructure and DevOps services to reduce your operational costs.

items.title: Cloud Infrastructure
items.desc: Design and deploy scalable infrastructure on AWS, Hetzner, or Arvancloud.

items.title: DevOps & CI/CD
items.desc: Automated pipelines, GitOps, and deployment workflows.

items.title: Kubernetes & Containers
items.desc: Container orchestration, cluster management, and microservices.

items.title: Monitoring & Observability
items.desc: Full-stack monitoring, alerting, and incident response.

steps.title: Assess
steps.desc: Audit your current infrastructure and identify optimization opportunities.

steps.title: Architect
steps.desc: Design scalable, cost-effective infrastructure tailored to your needs.

steps.title: Automate
steps.desc: Implement IaC, CI/CD, and monitoring to minimize manual operations.

items.title: E-commerce Platform
items.desc: Migration from on-premise to AWS with auto-scaling and CDN.

items.title: Fintech Startup
items.desc: Kubernetes cluster setup with GitOps deployment pipeline.
items.result: Deploy time reduced from hours to minutes

items.title: Media Company
items.desc: Hybrid Hetzner + Arvancloud setup for video streaming.
